name: Logan Garcia
description: Logan Garcia is a heavyweight boxerand a member of theAnimals, a gang devoted to establishing themselves as a new human subs-species.Logan was the owner of an Animal fight club in the Old Paint factory. Logan was sparring with a young man named Lenny Steiner and severley injured him in the sparring match by denting his skull. Disgusted by Lenny's "weakness" he had his body dumped in the bay with a cinderblock tied around his neck. Lenny's mother, Monica Steiner, contacted Logan about her son but he just rubbed his death in her face. Monica hired thefixerEl Capitanto avenge her son. The fixer...
